AlertCArea.title: AlertCArea
AlertCArea.description: An area defined by reference to a predefined ALERT-C location table.

alertCLocationCountryCode.title: alertCLocationCountryCode
alertCLocationCountryCode.description: ALERT-C country code as defined in IEC 62106.

alertCLocationTableNumber.title: alertCLocationTableNumber
alertCLocationTableNumber.description: Number allocated to an ALERT-C table in a country. Ref. EN ISO 14819-3 for the allocation of a location table number.

alertCLocationTableVersion.title: alertCLocationTableVersion
alertCLocationTableVersion.description: Version number associated with an ALERT-C table reference.

areaLocation.title: areaLocation
areaLocation.description: Area location defined by a specific Alert-C location.

AlertCDirection.title: AlertCDirection
AlertCDirection.description: The direction of traffic flow along the road to which the information relates.

alertCDirectionCoded.title: alertCDirectionCoded
alertCDirectionCoded.description: Direction of navigation with respect to secondary to primary location (RDS direction)

alertCDirectionNamed.title: alertCDirectionNamed
alertCDirectionNamed.description: ALERT-C name of a direction e.g. Brussels -> Lille.

alertCAffectedDirection.title: alertCAffectedDirection
alertCAffectedDirection.description: The direction(s) of traffic flow to which the situation, traffic data or information is related.

AlertCDirectionEnum.title: AlertCDirectionEnum
AlertCDirectionEnum.description: Direction used to reach the primary location from the secondary location in ALERT-C location table, as defined in CEN ISO 14819-1

AlertCLinear.title: AlertCLinear
AlertCLinear.description: A linear section along a road defined between two points on the road by reference to a pre-defined ALERT-C location table.

alertCLocationCountryCode.title: alertCLocationCountryCode
alertCLocationCountryCode.description: ALERT-C country code as defined in IEC 62106.

alertCLocationTableNumber.title: alertCLocationTableNumber
alertCLocationTableNumber.description: Number allocated to an ALERT-C table in a country. Ref. EN ISO 14819-3 for the allocation of a location table number.

alertCLocationTableVersion.title: alertCLocationTableVersion
alertCLocationTableVersion.description: Version number associated with an ALERT-C table reference.

AlertCLinearByCode.title: AlertCLinearByCode
AlertCLinearByCode.description: A linear section along a road defined by reference to a linear section in a pre-defined ALERT-C location table.

locationCodeForLinearLocation.title: locationCodeForLinearLocation
locationCodeForLinearLocation.description: Linear location defined by a specific Alert-C location.

AlertCLocation.title: AlertCLocation
AlertCLocation.description: Identification of a specific point, linear or area location in an ALERT-C location table.

specificLocation.title: specificLocation
specificLocation.description: Unique code within the ALERT-C location table which identifies the specific point, linear or area location.

AlertCLocationCode.title: AlertCLocationCode
AlertCLocationCode.description: A positive integer number (between 1 and 63 487) which uniquely identifies a pre-defined Alert C location defined within an Alert-C table.

AlertCMethod2Linear.title: AlertCMethod2Linear
AlertCMethod2Linear.description: A linear section along a road between two points, primary and secondary, which are pre-defined in an ALERT-C location table. Direction is FROM the secondary point TO the primary point, i.e. the primary point is downstream of the secondary point.

AlertCMethod2Point.title: AlertCMethod2Point
AlertCMethod2Point.description: A single point on the road network defined by reference to a point in a pre-defined ALERT-C location table and which has an associated direction of traffic flow.

AlertCMethod2PrimaryPointLocation.title: AlertCMethod2PrimaryPointLocation
AlertCMethod2PrimaryPointLocation.description: The point (called Primary point) which is either a single point or at the downstream end of a linear road section. The point is specified by a reference to a point in a pre-defined ALERT-C location table.

AlertCMethod2SecondaryPointLocation.title: AlertCMethod2SecondaryPointLocation
AlertCMethod2SecondaryPointLocation.description: The point (called Secondary point) which is at the upstream end of a linear road section. The point is specified by a reference to a point in a pre-defined ALERT-C location table.

AlertCMethod4Linear.title: AlertCMethod4Linear
AlertCMethod4Linear.description: A linear section along a road between two points, primary and secondary, which are pre-defined ALERT-C locations plus offset distance. Direction is FROM the secondary point TO the primary point, i.e. the primary point is downstream of the secondary point.

AlertCMethod4Point.title: AlertCMethod4Point
AlertCMethod4Point.description: A single point on the road network defined by reference to a point in a pre-defined ALERT-C location table plus an offset distance and which has an associated direction of traffic flow.

AlertCMethod4PrimaryPointLocation.title: AlertCMethod4PrimaryPointLocation
AlertCMethod4PrimaryPointLocation.description: The point (called Primary point) which is either a single point or at the downstream end of a linear road section. The point is specified by a reference to a point in a pre-defined ALERT-C location table plus a non-negative offset distance.

AlertCMethod4SecondaryPointLocation.title: AlertCMethod4SecondaryPointLocation
AlertCMethod4SecondaryPointLocation.description: The point (called Secondary point) which is at the upstream end of a linear road section. The point is specified by a reference to a point in a pre-defined Alert-C location table plus a non-negative offset distance.

AlertCPoint.title: AlertCPoint
AlertCPoint.description: A single point on the road network defined by reference to a pre-defined ALERT-C location table and which has an associated direction of traffic flow.

alertCLocationCountryCode.title: alertCLocationCountryCode
alertCLocationCountryCode.description: ALERT-C country code as defined IEC 62106.

alertCLocationTableNumber.title: alertCLocationTableNumber
alertCLocationTableNumber.description: Number allocated to an ALERT-C table in a country. Ref. EN ISO 14819-3 for the allocation of a location table number.

alertCLocationTableVersion.title: alertCLocationTableVersion
alertCLocationTableVersion.description: Version number associated with an ALERT-C table reference.

AltitudeConfidence.title: AltitudeConfidence
AltitudeConfidence.description: Evaluation of the altitude confidence assessed according to ETSI ISO 102894-2

altitudeAccuracyCodedValue.title: altitudeAccuracyCodedValue
altitudeAccuracyCodedValue.description: Absolute accuracy of reported value of a geographical point for a confidence level expressed by a coded scale.

altitudeAccuracyCodedError.title: altitudeAccuracyCodedError
altitudeAccuracyCodedError.description: Error code in case the altitude confidence is out of range or cannot be determined

AreaDestination.title: AreaDestination
AreaDestination.description: The specification of the destination of a defined route or itinerary which is an area.

AreaLocation.title: AreaLocation
AreaLocation.description: Location representing a geographic or geometric defined area which may be qualified by height information to provide additional geospatial discrimination (e.g. for snow in an area but only above a certain altitude).

areasAtWhichApplicable.title: areasAtWhichApplicable
areasAtWhichApplicable.description: Places, in generic terms, at which the corresponding information applies.

Carriageway.title: Carriageway
Carriageway.description: Supplementary positional information which details carriageway and lane locations. Several instances may exist where the element being described extends over more than one carriageway.

carriageway.title: carriageway
carriageway.description: Indicates the section of carriageway to which the location relates.

originalNumberOfLanes.title: originalNumberOfLanes
originalNumberOfLanes.description: Normal number of lanes, potentially available for moving traffic, before reduction due to situations. Hard shoulder should not be counted unless it is sometimes used operationally for moving traffic.

CarriagewayEnum.title: CarriagewayEnum
CarriagewayEnum.description: List of descriptors identifying specific carriageway details.

Destination.title: Destination
Destination.description: The specification of a destination. This may be either a point location or an area location.

DirectionPurposeEnum.title: DirectionPurposeEnum
DirectionPurposeEnum.description: Main purpose of a direction of a road

DistanceAlongLinearElement.title: DistanceAlongLinearElement
DistanceAlongLinearElement.description: Distance of a point along a linear element either measured from the start node or a defined referent on that linear element, where the start node is relative to the element definition rather than the direction of traffic flow.

DistanceFromLinearElementReferent.title: DistanceFromLinearElementReferent
DistanceFromLinearElementReferent.description: Distance of a point along a linear element measured from a "from referent" on the linear element, in the sense relative to the linear element definition rather than the direction of traffic flow or optionally towards a "towards referent".

distanceAlong.title: distanceAlong
distanceAlong.description: A measure of distance along a linear element.

fromReferent.title: fromReferent
fromReferent.description: A known location along the linear element from which the distanceAlong is measured, termed the "fromReferent" in EN ISO 19148.

towardsReferent.title: towardsReferent
towardsReferent.description: A known location along the linear element towards which the distanceAlong is measured, termed the "towardsReferent" in EN ISO 19148.

DistanceFromLinearElementStart.title: DistanceFromLinearElementStart
DistanceFromLinearElementStart.description: Distance of a point along a linear element measured from the start node of the linear element, where start node is relative to the element definition rather than the direction of traffic flow.

distanceAlong.title: distanceAlong
distanceAlong.description: A measure of distance along a linear element.

ExternalReferencing.title: ExternalReferencing
ExternalReferencing.description: A location defined by reference to an external/other referencing system.

externalLocationCode.title: externalLocationCode
externalLocationCode.description: A code in the external referencing system which defines the location.

externalReferencingSystem.title: externalReferencingSystem
externalReferencingSystem.description: Identification of the external/other location referencing system.

GeographicCharacteristicEnum.title: GeographicCharacteristicEnum
GeographicCharacteristicEnum.description: Descriptor to help to identify a specific location.

GmlLinearRing.title: GmlLinearRing
GmlLinearRing.description: Closed line string not self-intersecting (i.e. having as last point the first point)

GmlLineString.title: GmlLineString
GmlLineString.description: Line string based on GML (EN ISO 19136) definition: a curve defined by a series of two or more coordinate tuples. Unlike GML may be self-intersecting. If srsName attribute is not present, posList is assumed to use "ETRS89-LatLonh" reference system.

srsDimension.title: srsDimension
srsDimension.description: Provides the size of the tuple of coordinates of each point. This number is 2 or 3. By default when omitted the dimension shall be interpreted as 2.

srsName.title: srsName
srsName.description: Specifies the Coordinate Reference System (CRS) used to interpret the coordinates in this GmlLineString

posList.title: posList
posList.description: List of coordinate Tuples define the geometry of this GmlLineString. There must be at least 2 Tuples of coordinates.

GmlMultiPolygon.title: GmlMultiPolygon
GmlMultiPolygon.description: An area defined by a set of polygons acording to GML (EN ISO 19136).

GmlPolygon.title: GmlPolygon
GmlPolygon.description: Planar surface defined by 1 exterior boundary and 0 or more interior boundaries

exterior.title: exterior
exterior.description: A boundary of a polygonal surface consisting of a ring i.e. in the normal 2D case, a closed polygonal line distinguished as exterior. Such a polygonal line has at least 4 pairs of coordinates

interior.title: interior
interior.description: A boundary of internal patches of a polygonal surface consisting of a ring feature

GmlPosList.title: GmlPosList
GmlPosList.description: List of coordinates, space-separated, within the same coordinate reference system, defining a geometric entity. Modelled on DirectPositionListType in GML (EN ISO 19136), but constrained to represent a 2D or 3D polyline.

HeightCoordinate.title: HeightCoordinate
HeightCoordinate.description: Third coordinate for points defined geodetically

heightValue.title: heightValue
heightValue.description: Value in metres for the height measured vertically at to the planar coordinates the point corresponding.

heightType.title: heightType
heightType.description: Type of measured height.When it is omitted it is supposed to be the ellipsoidal height.

verticalPositionAccuracy.title: verticalPositionAccuracy
verticalPositionAccuracy.description: Defines the vertical position accuracy according to EN16803-1

HeightGradeEnum.title: HeightGradeEnum
HeightGradeEnum.description: List of height or vertical gradings of road sections.

HeightTypeEnum.title: HeightTypeEnum
HeightTypeEnum.description: Coded value for type of height

InfrastructureDescriptorEnum.title: InfrastructureDescriptorEnum
InfrastructureDescriptorEnum.description: Descriptor identifying infrastructure to help to identify a specific location.

IsoNamedArea.title: IsoNamedArea
IsoNamedArea.description: The ISO 3166-2 representation for the named area.

subdivisionType.title: subdivisionType
subdivisionType.description: The ISO 3166-2 subdivison type for the named area.

subdivisionCode.title: subdivisionCode
subdivisionCode.description: The ISO 3166-2 subdivision code for the named area.

Itinerary.title: Itinerary
Itinerary.description: Multiple (i.e. more than one) physically separate locations arranged as an ordered set that defines an itinerary or route.

routeDestination.title: routeDestination
routeDestination.description: Destination of a route or final location in an itinerary.

ItineraryByIndexedLocations.title: ItineraryByIndexedLocations
ItineraryByIndexedLocations.description: Multiple physically separate locations arranged as an ordered set that defines an itinerary or route. The index qualifier indicates the order.

locationContainedInItinerary.title: locationContainedInItinerary
locationContainedInItinerary.description: A location contained in an itinerary (i.e. an ordered set of locations defining a route or itinerary).

ItineraryByReference.title: ItineraryByReference
ItineraryByReference.description: Multiple (i.e. more than one) physically separate locations which are ordered that constitute an itinerary or route where they are defined by reference to a predefined itinerary.

predefinedItineraryReference.title: predefinedItineraryReference
predefinedItineraryReference.description: A reference to a versioned instance of a predefined itinerary as specified in a PredefinedLocationsPublication.

Lane.title: Lane
Lane.description: Indicates a specific lane or group of lanes.

laneNumber.title: laneNumber
laneNumber.description: The number of the lane, where 1 is nearest the hard shoulder/verge and the numbers increase towards the central reservation/road axis.

laneUsage.title: laneUsage
laneUsage.description: Indicates the specific lane to which the location relates.

LaneEnum.title: LaneEnum
LaneEnum.description: List of descriptors identifying specific lanes.

LinearDirectionEnum.title: LinearDirectionEnum
LinearDirectionEnum.description: Directions of traffic flow relative to the direction in which the linear element is defined.

LinearElement.title: LinearElement
LinearElement.description: A linear element along a single linear object, consistent with EN ISO 19148 definitions.

linearElementReferenceModel.title: linearElementReferenceModel
linearElementReferenceModel.description: The identifier of a road network reference model which segments the road network according to specific business rules.

linearElementReferenceModelVersion.title: linearElementReferenceModelVersion
linearElementReferenceModelVersion.description: The version of the identified road network reference model.

linearElementNature.title: linearElementNature
linearElementNature.description: An indication of the nature of the linear element.

LinearElementByCode.title: LinearElementByCode
LinearElementByCode.description: A linear element along a single linear object defined by its identifier or code in a road network reference model (specified in LinearElement class) which segments the road network according to specific business rules.

linearElementIdentifier.title: linearElementIdentifier
linearElementIdentifier.description: An identifier or code of a linear element (or link) in the road network reference model that is specified in the LinearElement class.

LinearElementByLineString.title: LinearElementByLineString
LinearElementByLineString.description: A linear element defined by a line string (class GmlLineString).

LinearElementByPoints.title: LinearElementByPoints
LinearElementByPoints.description: A linear element along a single linear object defined by its start and end points.

startPointOfLinearElement.title: startPointOfLinearElement
startPointOfLinearElement.description: The referent at a known location on the linear object which defines the start of the linear element.

intermediatePointOnLinearElement.title: intermediatePointOnLinearElement
intermediatePointOnLinearElement.description: A referent at a known location on the linear object which is neither the start or end of the linear element.

endPointOfLinearElement.title: endPointOfLinearElement
endPointOfLinearElement.description: The referent at a known location on the linear object which defines the end of the linear element.

LinearElementNatureEnum.title: LinearElementNatureEnum
LinearElementNatureEnum.description: List of indicative natures of linear elements.

LinearLocation.title: LinearLocation
LinearLocation.description: Location representing a linear section with optional directionality defined between two points.

secondarySupplementaryDescription.title: secondarySupplementaryDescription
secondarySupplementaryDescription.description: Supplementary description that applies to the secondary end of the linear location. Use when properties change along the Linear. For a one-way linear the secondary end should be the destination end.

LinearWithinLinearElement.title: LinearWithinLinearElement
LinearWithinLinearElement.description: A linear section along a linear element where the linear element is either a part of or the whole of a linear object (i.e. a road), consistent with ISO 19148 definitions.

administrativeAreaOfLinearSection.title: administrativeAreaOfLinearSection
administrativeAreaOfLinearSection.description: Identification of the road administration area which contains the specified linear section.

directionOnLinearSection.title: directionOnLinearSection
directionOnLinearSection.description: The direction of traffic flow on the linear section in terms of general destination direction.

directionRelativeOnLinearSection.title: directionRelativeOnLinearSection
directionRelativeOnLinearSection.description: The direction of traffic flow on the linear section relative to the direction in which the linear element is defined.

heightGradeOfLinearSection.title: heightGradeOfLinearSection
heightGradeOfLinearSection.description: Identification of whether the linear section that is part of the linear element is at, above or below the normal elevation of a linear element of that type (e.g. road or road section) at that location, typically used to indicate "grade" separation.

fromPoint.title: fromPoint
fromPoint.description: A point on the linear element that defines the start node of the linear section.

toPoint.title: toPoint
toPoint.description: A point on the linear element that defines the end node of the linear section.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: The specification of a location either on a network (as a point or a linear location) or as an area. This may be provided in one or more referencing systems.

coordinatesForDisplay.title: coordinatesForDisplay
coordinatesForDisplay.description: Coordinates that may be used by clients for visual display on user interfaces.

LocationByReference.title: LocationByReference
LocationByReference.description: A location defined by reference to a predefined location.

predefinedLocationReference.title: predefinedLocationReference
predefinedLocationReference.description: A reference to a versioned predefined location.

LocationGroup.title: LocationGroup
LocationGroup.description: Multiple (i.e. more than one) physically separate locations which have no specific order.

LocationGroupByList.title: LocationGroupByList
LocationGroupByList.description: A group of (i.e. more than one) physically separate locations which have no specific order and where each location is explicitly listed.

locationContainedInGroup.title: locationContainedInGroup
locationContainedInGroup.description: A location contained in a non-ordered group of locations.

LocationGroupByReference.title: LocationGroupByReference
LocationGroupByReference.description: A group of (i.e. more than one) physically separate locations which have no specific order that are defined by reference to a predefined non ordered location group.

predefinedLocationGroupReference.title: predefinedLocationGroupReference
predefinedLocationGroupReference.description: A reference to a versioned instance of a predefined location group as specified in a PredefinedLocationsPublication.

LocationReference.title: LocationReference
LocationReference.description: Represents one or more physically separate locations. Multiple locations may be related, as in an itinerary or route, or may be unrelated. One LocationReference should not use multiple Location objects to represent the same physical location.

NamedArea.title: NamedArea
NamedArea.description: An area defined by a name and/or in terms of known boundaries, such as country or county boundaries or allocated control area of particular authority. The attributes do not form a union; instead, the smallest intersection forms the resulting area.

NetworkLocation.title: NetworkLocation
NetworkLocation.description: The specification of a location on a network (as a point or a linear location).

NutsCode.title: NutsCode
NutsCode.description: A NUTS code (Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics).

NutsCodeTypeEnum.title: NutsCodeTypeEnum
NutsCodeTypeEnum.description: Types of NUTS codes (Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics) including LAU codes (Local Administrative Units).

NutsNamedArea.title: NutsNamedArea
NutsNamedArea.description: The NUTS-Code representation for the named area (Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics) or its LAU code representation (Local Administrative Unit).

nutsCodeType.title: nutsCodeType
nutsCodeType.description: The NUTS code type for the named area.

nutsCode.title: nutsCode
nutsCode.description: The NUTS code for the named area.

OffsetDistance.title: OffsetDistance
OffsetDistance.description: The non-negative offset distance from the ALERT-C referenced point to the actual point.

offsetDistance.title: offsetDistance
offsetDistance.description: The non-negative offset distance from the ALERT-C referenced point to the actual point. The ALERT-C locations in the primary and secondary locations must always encompass the linear section being specified, thus offset distance is towards the other point.

OpenlrAreaLocationReference.title: OpenlrAreaLocationReference
OpenlrAreaLocationReference.description: A two-dimensional part of the surface of the earth which is bounded by a closed curve. An area location may cover parts of the road network but does not necessarily need to. It is represented according to the OpenLR standard for Area Locations

OpenlrBasePointLocation.title: OpenlrBasePointLocation
OpenlrBasePointLocation.description: Holds common data that are used both in OpenlrPointAccessPoint and OpenlrPointAlongLine.

openlrSideOfRoad.title: openlrSideOfRoad
openlrSideOfRoad.description: Provides the of road where the corresponding point lies.

openlrOrientation.title: openlrOrientation
openlrOrientation.description: Orientation of the driving direction in relation with the direction of the underlying linear

openlrLocationReferencePoint.title: openlrLocationReferencePoint
openlrLocationReferencePoint.description: Allows defining the first point of the OpenLR path

openlrLastLocationReferencePoint.title: openlrLastLocationReferencePoint
openlrLastLocationReferencePoint.description: Allows defining the last point of the OpenLR path

openlrOffsets.title: openlrOffsets
openlrOffsets.description: Provides optional offsets relative to the path

OpenlrBaseReferencePoint.title: OpenlrBaseReferencePoint
OpenlrBaseReferencePoint.description: Base class used to hold data about a reference point.

openlrCoordinates.title: openlrCoordinates
openlrCoordinates.description: Provides coordinates for the base point of the OpenLR path

openlrLineAttributes.title: openlrLineAttributes
openlrLineAttributes.description: Properties of the line towards the topologically adjacent OpenLR location referencing point, on the shortest path to that point.

OpenlrCircleLocationReference.title: OpenlrCircleLocationReference
OpenlrCircleLocationReference.description: The OpenLR method of area definition by providing a center position and a radius

openlrRadius.title: openlrRadius
openlrRadius.description: The radius of the corresponding circular area.

OpenlrClosedLineLocationReference.title: OpenlrClosedLineLocationReference
OpenlrClosedLineLocationReference.description:
The OpenLR method of area definition by providing a closed path (i.e. a circuit) in the road network.
The boundary always consists of road segments

openlrLastLine.title: openlrLastLine
openlrLastLine.description: Provides the line attributes for the last line section closing the polygon.

OpenlrGeoCoordinate.title: OpenlrGeoCoordinate
OpenlrGeoCoordinate.description: A geo-coordinate pair is a position in a map defined by its longitude and latitude coordinate values.

openlrCoordinates.title: openlrCoordinates
openlrCoordinates.description: Corresponding coordinates of an OpenLR point defined by its only coordinates.

OpenlrGridLocationReference.title: OpenlrGridLocationReference
OpenlrGridLocationReference.description: Area defined using an OpenLR™ method consisting in defining it by a tessellation of rectangles

openlrNumColumns.title: openlrNumColumns
openlrNumColumns.description: The number that the base rectangle should be multiplied in the east direction

openlrNumRows.title: openlrNumRows
openlrNumRows.description: The number that the base rectangle should be multiplied in the north direction

OpenlrLastLocationReferencePoint.title: OpenlrLastLocationReferencePoint
OpenlrLastLocationReferencePoint.description: The sequence of location reference points is terminated by a last location reference point.

firstDirection.title: firstDirection
firstDirection.description: First OpenLR reference in first/main direction.

oppositeDirection.title: oppositeDirection
oppositeDirection.description: If both direction, this is the reference in the opposite direction against firstDirection.

OpenlrLineAttributes.title: OpenlrLineAttributes
OpenlrLineAttributes.description: Line attributes are part of a location reference point and consists of functional road class (FRC),form of way (FOW) and bearing (BEAR) data.

openlrFunctionalRoadClass.title: openlrFunctionalRoadClass
openlrFunctionalRoadClass.description: Certain aspects of the physical form that a Road Element takes. It is based on a number of certain physical and traffic properties. (EN ISO 14825 § 7.2.85)

openlrFormOfWay.title: openlrFormOfWay
openlrFormOfWay.description: A classification based on the importance of the role that the Road Element (or Ferry Connection) performs in the connectivity of the total road network. (EN ISO 14825 § 7.2.88)

openlrBearing.title: openlrBearing
openlrBearing.description: defines the bearing field as an integer value between 0 and 359

OpenlrLineLocationReference.title: OpenlrLineLocationReference
OpenlrLineLocationReference.description: A line location reference is defined by an ordered sequence of location reference points and a terminating last location reference point.

openlrOffsets.title: openlrOffsets
openlrOffsets.description: Allows for adding offsets to the line location path defined by nodes when the starting (respectively ending) point does not coincide with a node.

OpenlrLocationReferencePoint.title: OpenlrLocationReferencePoint
OpenlrLocationReferencePoint.description: The basis of a location reference is a sequence of location reference points (LRPs).

openlrPathAttributes.title: openlrPathAttributes
openlrPathAttributes.description: Additional path attributes relative to the next point

OpenlrOffsets.title: OpenlrOffsets
OpenlrOffsets.description: Offsets are used to locate the start and end of a location more precisely than bounding to the nodes in a network.

openlrPositiveOffset.title: openlrPositiveOffset
openlrPositiveOffset.description: The positive offset along the line of the location measured along the line reference path between the start point of the location reference and the starting node of the line reference path.

openlrNegativeOffset.title: openlrNegativeOffset
openlrNegativeOffset.description: The negative offset along the line of the location measured along the line reference path between the end point of the location reference and the ending node of the line reference path.

OpenlrPathAttributes.title: OpenlrPathAttributes
OpenlrPathAttributes.description: Properties of the path from the associated location reference point to the next location reference point, which are specified to assist correct identification of the point in an external map data source.

openlrLowestFrcToNextLRPoint.title: openlrLowestFrcToNextLRPoint
openlrLowestFrcToNextLRPoint.description: The lowest FRC to the next point indicates the lowest functional road class used in the location reference path to the next LR-point.

openlrDistanceToNextLRPoint.title: openlrDistanceToNextLRPoint
openlrDistanceToNextLRPoint.description: The DNP attribute measures the distance in meters between two consecutive location reference-points along the location reference path described in the corresponding enumeration

OpenlrPointAttributes.title: OpenlrPointAttributes
OpenlrPointAttributes.description: Holds common data that are used both in OpenlrPointAccessPoint and OpenlrPointAlongLine.

openlrSideOfRoad.title: openlrSideOfRoad
openlrSideOfRoad.description: Provides the of road where the corresponding point lies.

openlrOrientation.title: openlrOrientation
openlrOrientation.description: Orientation of the driving direction in relation with the direction of the underlying linear

OpenlrPointLocationReference.title: OpenlrPointLocationReference
OpenlrPointLocationReference.description: A point location is a zero-dimensional element in a map that specifies a geometric location.

OpenlrPoiWithAccessPoint.title: OpenlrPoiWithAccessPoint
OpenlrPoiWithAccessPoint.description: A point of interest (POI) along a line with access is a point location which is defined by a linear reference path, an offset value (defining the access point) from the starting node of this path and a coordinate pair that defines the POI itself.

openlrCoordinates.title: openlrCoordinates
openlrCoordinates.description: The coordinate of the actual point of interest

OpenlrPolygonCorners.title: OpenlrPolygonCorners
OpenlrPolygonCorners.description: A geodetic coordinate Tuple that defines the vertices of the underlying geometrical polygon.

openlrCoordinates.title: openlrCoordinates
openlrCoordinates.description: Corresponding coordinates of vertices that define a polygon.

OpenlrPolygonLocationReference.title: OpenlrPolygonLocationReference
OpenlrPolygonLocationReference.description: The OpenLR method of area definition by providing points that bound the area

OpenlrRectangle.title: OpenlrRectangle
OpenlrRectangle.description: Area delimited by a rectangle defined by the geodetic co-ordinates of the two ends of its diagonal from south-west to north-east (the rectangle having two sides that are parallel to lines of latitude)

openlrLowerLeft.title: openlrLowerLeft
openlrLowerLeft.description: The lower left corner of the rectangle.

openlrUpperRight.title: openlrUpperRight
openlrUpperRight.description: The upper right corner of the rectangle.

OpenlrRectangleLocationReference.title: OpenlrRectangleLocationReference
OpenlrRectangleLocationReference.description: The openLR method of area definition by providing a rectangular shape defined by two geo-coordinate pairs

PercentageDistanceAlongLinearElement.title: PercentageDistanceAlongLinearElement
PercentageDistanceAlongLinearElement.description: Distance of a point along a linear element measured from the start node expressed as a percentage of the whole length of the linear element, where start node is relative to the element definition rather than the direction of traffic flow.

percentageDistanceAlong.title: percentageDistanceAlong
percentageDistanceAlong.description: A measure of distance along a linear element from the start of the element expressed as a percentage of the total length of the linear object.

PointAlongLinearElement.title: PointAlongLinearElement
PointAlongLinearElement.description: A point on a linear element where the linear element is either a part of or the whole of a linear object (i.e. a road), consistent with EN ISO 19148 definitions.

administrativeAreaOfPoint.title: administrativeAreaOfPoint
administrativeAreaOfPoint.description: Identification of the road administration area which contains the specified point.

directionAtPoint.title: directionAtPoint
directionAtPoint.description: The direction of traffic flow at the specified point in terms of general destination direction.

directionRelativeAtPoint.title: directionRelativeAtPoint
directionRelativeAtPoint.description: The direction of traffic flow at the specified point relative to the direction in which the linear element is defined.

heightGradeOfPoint.title: heightGradeOfPoint
heightGradeOfPoint.description: Identification of whether the point on the linear element is at, above or below the normal elevation of a linear element of that type (e.g. road or road section) at that location, typically used to indicate "grade" separation.

PointByCoordinates.title: PointByCoordinates
PointByCoordinates.description: A single point defined only by a coordinate set with an optional bearing direction.

bearing.title: bearing
bearing.description: A bearing at the point measured in degrees (0 - 359). Unless otherwise specified the reference direction corresponding to 0 degrees is North.

PointCoordinates.title: PointCoordinates
PointCoordinates.description: A pair of planar coordinates defining the geodetic position of a single point using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

latitude.title: latitude
latitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

longitude.title: longitude
longitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees using the European Terrestrial Reference System 1989 (ETRS89).

horizontalPositionAccuracy.title: horizontalPositionAccuracy
horizontalPositionAccuracy.description: Defines the horizontal position accuracy according EN 16803-1

PointDestination.title: PointDestination
PointDestination.description: The specification of the destination of a defined route or itinerary which is a point.

PointLocation.title: PointLocation
PointLocation.description: Location representing a single geospatial point.

alertCPoint.title: alertCPoint
alertCPoint.description: The point location expressed using AlertC. Multiple instances of AlertCPoint shall represent the same real-world geographic feature.

PositionAccuracy.title: PositionAccuracy
PositionAccuracy.description: Horizontal position accuracy parameters defined according to EN 16803-1

accuracyPercentile50.title: accuracyPercentile50
accuracyPercentile50.description: Accuracy defined by the 50th percentile of the cumulative distribution of position errors.

accuracyPercentile75.title: accuracyPercentile75
accuracyPercentile75.description: Accuracy defined by the 75th percentile of the cumulative distribution of position errors

accuracyPercentile95.title: accuracyPercentile95
accuracyPercentile95.description: Accuracy defined by the 95th percentile of the cumulative distribution of position errors

PositionConfidenceCodedErrorEnum.title: PositionConfidenceCodedErrorEnum
PositionConfidenceCodedErrorEnum.description: Error code for horizontal or vertical position confidence

PositionConfidenceEllipse.title: PositionConfidenceEllipse
PositionConfidenceEllipse.description: Confidence ellipse position defined in a shape of ellipse with a predefined confidence level (e.g. 95 %). The centre of the ellipse shape corresponds to the reference position point for which the position accuracy is evaluated.

semiMajorAxisLength.title: semiMajorAxisLength
semiMajorAxisLength.description: Half of length of the major axis, i.e. distance between the centre point and major axis point of the position accuracy ellipse.

semiMajorAxisLengthCodedError.title: semiMajorAxisLengthCodedError
semiMajorAxisLengthCodedError.description: Provides a coded error in case the semi-major axis length is not defined

semiMinorAxisLength.title: semiMinorAxisLength
semiMinorAxisLength.description: Half of length of the minor axis, i.e. distance between the centre point and minor axis point of the position accuracy ellipse

semiMinorAxisLengthCodedError.title: semiMinorAxisLengthCodedError
semiMinorAxisLengthCodedError.description: Provides a coded error in case the semi-minor axis length is not defined

semiMajorAxisOrientation.title: semiMajorAxisOrientation
semiMajorAxisOrientation.description: Orientation direction of the ellipse major axis of the position accuracy ellipse with regards to the geographic north.

semiMajorAxisOrientationError.title: semiMajorAxisOrientationError
semiMajorAxisOrientationError.description: Indicates whether the ellipse orientation is unavailable (True) or not (False)

PredefinedItinerary.title: PredefinedItinerary
PredefinedItinerary.description: An identifiable versioned instance of a predefined itinerary.

predefinedItineraryName.title: predefinedItineraryName
predefinedItineraryName.description: A name assigned to the predefined itinerary.

PredefinedLocation.title: PredefinedLocation
PredefinedLocation.description: An identifiable versioned instance of a single predefined location.

predefinedLocationName.title: predefinedLocationName
predefinedLocationName.description: A name assigned to the predefined location (e.g. extracted out of the network operator's gazetteer).

PredefinedLocationGroup.title: PredefinedLocationGroup
PredefinedLocationGroup.description: An identifiable versioned instance of a predefined group of non-ordered locations (i.e. more than one).

predefinedLocationGroupName.title: predefinedLocationGroupName
predefinedLocationGroupName.description: A name assigned to the predefined group of non-ordered locations.

PredefinedLocationReference.title: PredefinedLocationReference
PredefinedLocationReference.description: A location reference which is predefined and may be realised by a predefined itinerary, non-ordered group of locations or single location.

PredefinedLocationsPublication.title: PredefinedLocationsPublication
PredefinedLocationsPublication.description: A publication containing one or more groups of predefined locations organised either as itineraries, non-ordered groups or as individual locations.

Referent.title: Referent
Referent.description: A referent on a linear object that has a known location such as a node, a reference marker (e.g. a marker-post), an intersection etc.

referentIdentifier.title: referentIdentifier
referentIdentifier.description: The identifier of the referent, unique on the specified linear element (i.e. road or part of).

referentName.title: referentName
referentName.description: The name of the referent, e.g. a junction or intersection name.

ReferentTypeEnum.title: ReferentTypeEnum
ReferentTypeEnum.description: A set of types of known points along a linear object such as a road.

RelativePositionOnCarriagewayEnum.title: RelativePositionOnCarriagewayEnum
RelativePositionOnCarriagewayEnum.description: Identifies a relative position across a carriageway

roadDestination.title: roadDestination
roadDestination.description: A destination associated with this road.

roadNumber.title: roadNumber
roadNumber.description: The road number designated by the road authority

SingleRoadLinearLocation.title: SingleRoadLinearLocation
SingleRoadLinearLocation.description: Location representing a linear section along a single road with optional directionality defined between two points on the same road. No matter the kind of linear reference it uses, the constraint of using only a single road must be preserved.

alertCLinear.title: alertCLinear
alertCLinear.description: The linear location expressed using AlertC. Multiple instances of AlertCLinear shall represent the same real-world geographic feature.

SubdivisionCode.title: SubdivisionCode
SubdivisionCode.description: ISO 3166-2 country sub-division code (up to 3 characters).

SupplementaryPositionalDescription.title: SupplementaryPositionalDescription
SupplementaryPositionalDescription.description: A collection of supplementary positional information which improves the precision of the location.

directionPurpose.title: directionPurpose
directionPurpose.description: Identifies the main purpose of the road at the location

geographicDescriptor.title: geographicDescriptor
geographicDescriptor.description: Descriptor which identifies a geographic characteristic to help identify the specific location

infrastructureDescriptor.title: infrastructureDescriptor
infrastructureDescriptor.description: Descriptor which identifies infrastructure to help identify the specific location.

lengthAffected.title: lengthAffected
lengthAffected.description: This indicates the length (measured in metres) of carriageway (and lanes) affected by the associated traffic element.

locationDescription.title: locationDescription
locationDescription.description: Supplementary human-readable description of the location

locationPrecision.title: locationPrecision
locationPrecision.description: Indicates that the location is given with a precision which is better than the stated value in metres.

sequentialRampNumber.title: sequentialRampNumber
sequentialRampNumber.description: The sequential number of an exit/entrance ramp from a given location in a given direction (normally used to indicate a specific exit/entrance in a complex junction/intersection).

roadInformation.title: roadInformation
roadInformation.description: Information on a set of one or more roads. The location could correspond to a part of the road identified, the whole stretch of road identified, or a combination of multiple road sections.

TpegAreaDescriptor.title: TpegAreaDescriptor
TpegAreaDescriptor.description: A descriptor for describing an area location.

tpegAreaDescriptorType.title: tpegAreaDescriptorType
tpegAreaDescriptorType.description: The nature of the descriptor used to define the location under consideration (derived from the TPEG Loc table 03).

TpegAreaLocation.title: TpegAreaLocation
TpegAreaLocation.description: A geographic or geometric area defined by a TPEG-Loc structure which may include height information for additional geospatial discrimination.

TpegDescriptor.title: TpegDescriptor
TpegDescriptor.description: A collection of information providing descriptive references to locations using the TPEG-Loc location referencing approach.

descriptor.title: descriptor
descriptor.description: A text string which describes or elaborates the location.

TpegFramedPoint.title: TpegFramedPoint
TpegFramedPoint.description: A point on the road network which is framed between two other points on the same road.

framedPoint.title: framedPoint
framedPoint.description: A single non-junction point on the road network which is framed between two other specified points on the road network.

to.title: to
to.description: The location at the downstream end of the section of road which frames the TPEGFramedPoint.

from.title: from
from.description: The location at the upstream end of the section of road which frames the TPEGFramedPoint.

TpegGeometricArea.title: TpegGeometricArea
TpegGeometricArea.description: A geometric area defined by a centre point and a radius.

radius.title: radius
radius.description: The radius of the corresponding circular area

centrePoint.title: centrePoint
centrePoint.description: Centre point of a circular geometric area.

TpegHeight.title: TpegHeight
TpegHeight.description: Height information which provides additional discrimination for the applicable area.

height.title: height
height.description: A measurement of height in metres

heightType.title: heightType
heightType.description: A descriptive identification of relative height using TPEG-Loc location referencing.

TpegIlcPointDescriptor.title: TpegIlcPointDescriptor
TpegIlcPointDescriptor.description: A descriptor for describing a junction by defining the intersecting roads.

tpegIlcPointDescriptorType.title: tpegIlcPointDescriptorType
tpegIlcPointDescriptorType.description: The nature of the descriptor used to define the location under consideration (derived from the TPEG Loc table 03).

TpegJunction.title: TpegJunction
TpegJunction.description: A point on the road network which is a road junction point.

name.title: name
name.description: A name which identifies a junction point on the road network

ilc.title: ilc
ilc.description: A descriptor for describing a junction by identifying the intersecting roads at a road junction.

otherName.title: otherName
otherName.description: A descriptive name which helps to identify the junction point.

TpegJunctionPointDescriptor.title: TpegJunctionPointDescriptor
TpegJunctionPointDescriptor.description: A descriptor for describing a point at a junction on a road network.

tpegJunctionPointDescriptorType.title: tpegJunctionPointDescriptorType
tpegJunctionPointDescriptorType.description: The nature of the descriptor used to define the location under consideration (derived from the TPEG Loc table 03).

TpegLinearLocation.title: TpegLinearLocation
TpegLinearLocation.description: A linear section along a single road defined between two points on the same road by a TPEG-Loc structure.

to.title: to
to.description: The location at the down stream end of the linear section of road.

from.title: from
from.description: The location at the up stream end of the linear section of road.

TpegLoc01FramedPointLocationSubtypeEnum.title: TpegLoc01FramedPointLocationSubtypeEnum
TpegLoc01FramedPointLocationSubtypeEnum.description: Types of points on the road network framed by two other points on the same road.

TpegLoc03IlcPointDescriptorSubtypeEnum.title: TpegLoc03IlcPointDescriptorSubtypeEnum
TpegLoc03IlcPointDescriptorSubtypeEnum.description: Descriptors for describing a junction by identifying the intersecting roads at a road junction.

TpegLoc03JunctionPointDescriptorSubtypeE.title: TpegLoc03JunctionPointDescriptorSubtypeEnum
TpegLoc03JunctionPointDescriptorSubtypeE.description: Descriptors for describing a point at a road junction.

TpegLoc03OtherPointDescriptorSubtypeEnum.title: TpegLoc03OtherPointDescriptorSubtypeEnum
TpegLoc03OtherPointDescriptorSubtypeEnum.description: Descriptors other than junction names and road descriptors which can help to identify the location of points on the road network.

TpegNamedOnlyArea.title: TpegNamedOnlyArea
TpegNamedOnlyArea.description: An area defined by a well-known name.

TpegNonJunctionPoint.title: TpegNonJunctionPoint
TpegNonJunctionPoint.description: A point on the road network which is not a road junction point.

name.title: name
name.description: A descriptive name which helps to identify the non-junction point. At least one descriptor must identify the road on which the point is located, i.e. must be of type 'linkName' or 'localLinkName'.

TpegOtherPointDescriptor.title: TpegOtherPointDescriptor
TpegOtherPointDescriptor.description: General descriptor for describing a point.

tpegOtherPointDescriptorType.title: tpegOtherPointDescriptorType
tpegOtherPointDescriptorType.description: The nature of the descriptor used to define the location under consideration (derived from the TPEG Loc table 03).

TpegPoint.title: TpegPoint
TpegPoint.description: A point on the road network which is either a junction point or a non junction point.

TpegPointDescriptor.title: TpegPointDescriptor
TpegPointDescriptor.description: A descriptor for describing a point location.

TpegPointLocation.title: TpegPointLocation
TpegPointLocation.description: A single point on the road network defined by a TPEG-Loc structure and which has an associated direction of traffic flow.

TpegSimplePoint.title: TpegSimplePoint
TpegSimplePoint.description: A point on the road network which is not bounded by any other points on the road network.

point.title: point
point.description: A single point defined by a coordinate set and TPEG descriptors.
